name: Aether
tagline: An autonomous weather balloon module that can collect atmospheric data such as temperature, pressure etc for the purpose of scientific study
body:
# Project Aether
An autonomous weather balloon module that can collect atmospheric data such as temperature, pressure etc for the purpose of scientific study

# Video/Demo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o2UGFA5-HPI

# Pictures
![Model](http://www.prashanthr.info/portfolio/projects/aether/images/Aether_Model_1.jpg) ![Model 2](http://www.prashanthr.info/portfolio/projects/aether/images/Aether_Model_2.jpg) ![Data Flow](http://www.prashanthr.info/portfolio/projects/aether/images/data-flow.PNG) ![Source And Sink](http://www.prashanthr.info/portfolio/projects/aether/images/source-sink.PNG) ![Architecture Design](http://www.prashanthr.info/portfolio/projects/aether/images/ADS.jpg) ![Detailed Design](http://www.prashanthr.info/portfolio/projects/aether/images/DDS.jpg) ![Product](http://www.prashanthr.info/portfolio/projects/aether/images/product_image_aether.jpg) ![Aerotag Team Logo](http://www.prashanthr.info/portfolio/projects/aether/images/aerotag_logo.png)
